description:
This program focuses on delivering immersive, in-person bootcamps in strategic cities, equipping participants with practical knowledge of the Filecoin ecosystem.
The bootcamps, accessible via recorded sessions on the playlist:
 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkwIint283Ca8iyV5_HtRGX0LzvHMRCUR
target students, developers, and local tech communities, fostering hands-on learning through workshops, hackathons, and collaborative projects.
Strategically hosted in key African cities, these bootcamps aim to bridge the skills gap by providing real-world training on building decentralized applications (dApps), deploying smart contracts, and leveraging Filecoin’s storage solutions. Since its inception, the program has engaged hundreds of participants, offering a platform to explore innovative use cases such as educational content storage, AI integration, and community-driven tech solutions. By combining expert-led sessions with practical exercises, Filecoin Africa empowers the next generation of African tech leaders to contribute to the global Web3 landscape, with a strong emphasis on accessibility and local impact.
end_user:
Dedicated to advancing education and skills development in decentralized technologies across the continent. This program focuses on delivering immersive, in-person bootcamps in strategic cities, equipping participants with practical knowledge of the Filecoin ecosystem, including decentralized storage, the Filecoin Virtual Machine (FVM), IPFS, and blockchain applications. The bootcamps, accessible via recorded sessions on the playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkwIint283Ca8iyV5_HtRGX0LzvHMRCUR, target students, developers, and local tech communities, fostering hands-on learning through workshops, hackathons, and collaborative projects.
Strategically hosted in key African cities, these bootcamps aim to bridge the skills gap by providing real-world training on building decentralized applications (dApps), deploying smart contracts, and leveraging Filecoin’s storage solutions. Since its inception, the program has engaged hundreds of participants, offering a platform to explore innovative use cases such as educational content storage, AI integration, and community-driven tech solutions. By combining expert-led sessions with practical exercises, Filecoin Africa empowers the next generation of African tech leaders to contribute to the global Web3 landscape, with a strong emphasis on accessibility and local impact.
